abstract: Update: 5:14 p.m.: CBS has confirmed that the series finale will be shown next week. “Without question, there are passionate viewers watching this program; we simply wish there were more,” Nina Tassler, the president of CBS Entertainment, said in a statement.
lead_paragraph: Update: 5:14 p.m.: CBS has confirmed that the series finale will be shown next week. “Without question, there are passionate viewers watching this program; we simply wish there were more,” Nina Tassler, the president of CBS Entertainment, said in a statement.
